activity.delegate_dql: select g.i_all_users_names from dm_group g, dm_user u where any g.i_supergroups_names in (select alias_value from d2_dictionary_value where dictionary_name like 'GMP Applicable Sites' and any alias_value is not nullstring and (alias_value like '%_authors' or alias_value like '%_reviewers')and object_name in ($repeatingvalue(applicable_sites)) ENABLE(ROW_BASED)) and any g.i_all_users_names = u.user_name and u.user_state = 0 and ('$value(wf_doc_coordinators) ' = ' ' or u.user_name not in ($repeatingvalue(wf_doc_coordinators))) order by 1
